## MinedReceipt type

Either a [FailedReceipt](./lib-base.failedreceipt.md) or a [SuccessfulReceipt](./lib-base.successfulreceipt.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MinedReceipt<R = unknown, D = unknown> = FailedReceipt<R> | SuccessfulReceipt<R, D>;
```
